LanguageData.AvP_AllowUSCMFactionToolTip: Enable all USCM factions, Scenarios, related incidents and events
LanguageData.AvP_AllowXenomorphFactionToolTip: Enable all Xenomorph related incidents and events
LanguageData.AvP_AllowYautjaFactionToolTip: Enable all Yautja factions, Scenarios, related incidents and events
LanguageData.AvP_AllowXenomorphStealthToolTip: Allows Xenomorphs to hide in darkness
LanguageData.AvP_AllowHiddenInfectionsToolTip: Disable this to stop pawns spawning impregnated
LanguageData.AvP_AllowPredalienImpregnationsToolTip: Disable this to Predaliens from being able to impregnate female pawns
LanguageData.AvP_FacehuggerRemovalDeathChanceToolTip: {0}% of patient death on operation failiure when trying to remove a facehugger
LanguageData.AvP_EmbryoRemovalDeathChanceToolTip: {0}% of patient death on operation failiure when trying to remove a chestburster
LanguageData.AvP_AllowXenoCocoonMetamorphToolTip: Allow Cocooned pawns to be converted to Ovimorphs(Eggs) if there are no Queens present
LanguageData.AvP_AllowNonHumanlikeHostsToolTip: Allows Xenomorph Impregnation of Non-Humanlike pawns
LanguageData.AvP_PredalienSpawningToolTip: Enables impregnated Yautja to result in a Predalien
LanguageData.AvP_ThrumbomorphSpawningToolTip: Enables impregnated Thrumbos to result in a Thrumbomorph
LanguageData.AvP_DesignatorRearmTrapDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.AvP_CommandRearmDesc: Rearm a sprung trap so it can be triggered again.
LanguageData.AvP_MessageMedicalOperationFailureMinorA: {SURGEON_labelShort} has failed to remove the parasite on {PATIENT_labelShort}.
LanguageData.AvP_MessageMedicalOperationFailureMinorB: {SURGEON_labelShort} has failed to remove the parasite on {PATIENT_labelShort}, its blood splashes onto the floor.
LanguageData.AvP_MessageMedicalOperationFailureCatast: {SURGEON_labelShort} has failed to remove the parasite attached to {PATIENT_labelShort}, it.
LanguageData.AvP_MessageMedicalOperationFailureRidicu: {SURGEON_labelShort} was trying to remove the parasite attached to {PATIENT_labelShort} and it didnt like it.....
LanguageData.AvP_MessageMedicalOperationFailureFatal: something went terribly wrong while {SURGEON_labelShort} was attempting to remove the parasite attached to {PATIENT_labelShort}'s face......they didnt make it...: {2}
LanguageData.AvP_SelfDestructDevice_Detonate_Desc: Detonate this pawn's self destruct device.
LanguageData.AvP_SelfDestructDevice_Timer_Desc: Start this pawn's 10 second self destruct countdown. clicking a second time will stop the countdown
LanguageData.AvP_ShardInjector_UseDesc: Use a Health Shard to quickly return to the hunt
LanguageData.AvP_Medicomp_TendSelfDesc: Tend thier own wounds on the spot
LanguageData.AvP_USCM_Dropship_CommandAddFuelDesc: Add fuel to Cargo Pod Transport
LanguageData.AvP_Alert_RescueFromCocoon_ColonistsDesc:
These colonists are incapacitated in a cocoon:

{0}
Send another colonist to rescue them and carry them back to bed.

(To rescue, select another colonist, then right click on the victim and select Rescue. But beware.....
LanguageData.AvP_Neomorph_Impregnator_TriggerB: {0} thinks they hear a soft hiss from the {1}......
LanguageData.AvP_Neomorph_Impregnation_Added: {0} notices a slight haze around them and feels a slight pain in their {1}
LanguageData.AvP_Xenomorph_Facehugger_Attach: A parasite has attached itself to {0}'s {1}
LanguageData.AvP_Xenomorph_Facehugger_Detach: The parasite has detached itself from {0}...they seem OK...for now...
LanguageData.AvP_Xenomorph_Chestburster_PreEmerge: {0} has collapsed and is writhing around! something is wrong...
LanguageData.AvP_Xenomorph_Chestburster_Emerge: {0}'s convulsions stop suddenly and a Chestburster emerges in a gorey mess from {0}'s {1}
LanguageData.AvP_Neomorph_Bloodburster_Emerge: {0}'s convulsions stop suddenly and a Bloodburster emerges in a gorey mess from {0}'s {1}
LanguageData.AvP_Xenomorph_Chestburster_Hides: the Chestburster disappears into the surrounding area and hides
LanguageData.AvP_Xenomorph_Chestburster_Matures: the Chestburster has matured into a fully grown {0}
